title: Tron: Evolution
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   TRON: Evolution is an immersive action game set on the digital grid. Explore TRON’s cities using free running and battle a dictator’s seemingly unstoppable army as the powerful System Monitor.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Bonus Multiplayer Skin - Sam Flynn
childDownloads.description: Download the Sam Flynn multiplayer skin  for TRON: Evolution. The only son of Kevin Flynn—the adventurous and rebellious 27-year-old who has turned away from the ENCOM money and is haunted by his father’s disappearance.
